torch_geometric.utils¶

degree(index, num_nodes=None, dtype=None, device=None)[source]¶

Computes the degree of a given index tensor.

Parameters:
  • index (LongTensor) – Source or target indices of edges.
  • num_nodes (int, optional) – The number of nodes in index. (default: None)
  • dtype (torch.dtype, optional) – tensor.
  • device (torch.device, optional) – The desired device of returned tensor.
Return type:

Tensor

 
from torch_geometric.utils import degree
index = torch.tensor([0, 1, 0, 2, 0])
output = degree(index)
print(output)

tensor([ 3.,  1.,  1.])
